categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Edease was a male Human corporal who lived on the planet of Balmorra. He made a living by selling heavy armor to the citizens of the Sith Empire.

Edease appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Heavy Armor Vendor for Imperial players on Balmorra. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, he was removed from the game along with the rest of the Heavy Armor Vendors.
